title: Demi Moore shares sweet throwback snap with firstborn daughter Rumer Willis
text:
Demi Moore shared a heartwarming throwback Instagram snap Tuesday of herself getting a kiss on the cheek from her eldest daughter Rumer Willis.

Although Rumer was just a little girl in the photo, the daughter of Demi and Bruce Willis is now 31 and has gone into acting herself.

In her caption, Demi, 56, quoted a section of her new memoir Inside Out where she gushed that becoming a mother 'was euphoric.'

'Euphoric': Demi Moore shared a heartwarming throwback snap of herself getting a kiss on the cheek from her eldest daughter Rumer Willis

'Being a mother felt totally natural. It’s one of the few things I can confidently say I was innately good at,' Demi recalled in the book.

'Nurturing Rumer, having someone to love who loved and needed me right back, unconditionally, exactly as I was, without any kind of performance, was euphoric.'

Demi was married to Bruce from 1987 until 2000 and the pair brought three daughters into the world - Rumer, Scout, 28, and Tallulah, 25.

She went on to have an infamous failed marriage to Ashton Kutcher, who is 15 years her junior, and made a splash by writing about the relationship in Inside Out.

Me and my babies: Demi was married to Bruce from 1987 until 2000 and the pair brought three daughters into the world - Rumer, Scout (right), 28, and Tallulah (second from right), 25

Demi claimed he was unfaithful to her twice and that they had a pair of threesomes, adding that she was 'addicted' to him.

The A Few Good Men actress also wrote that she fell off the wagon after she suffered a miscarriage while six months pregnant with Ashton's baby.

Demi had been 20 years sober but resumed drinking to cope with her loss after Ashton said: 'I don't know if alcoholism is a real thing,' she wrote.

The way they were: Bruce and Demi are pictured together during their marriage at the Planet Hollywood opening in London in 1993

Ashton has gone on to marry his old That 70s Show co-star Mila Kunis, with whom he shares his daughter Wyatt, five, and son Dimitri, two.

As Demi did the publicity rounds for the new book and her claims about Ashton circulated, he addressed the matter on Twitter.

'I was about to push the button on a really snarky tweet. Then I saw my son, daughter, and wife and I deleted it,' he wrote the day Inside Out was released.
description: Demi Moore shared a heartwarming throwback snap of herself getting a kiss on the cheek from her daughter Rumer Willis.
